snippet: “HitRECord on TV,” making its debut on Pivot, is a television version of a website where various artists collaborate on short films, songs and other creations.
abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews television variety show HitRECord on TV, created by and featuring Joseph Gordon-Levitt, on Pivot.
lead_paragraph: “HitRECord on TV,” making its debut on Pivot, is a television version of a website where various artists collaborate on short films, songs and other creations.

headline.seo: ‘HitRECord on TV,’ Based on the Artistic Crowdsourcing Site
headline.main: ‘Let’s Put On a Show! I’ll Make ...’
